name: Killerpiller Cove
description:
You're a water caterpillar. You eat humanoids.

killerpiller (in water) will swim towards

the cursor or your finger when HELD DOWN

bounce him off of the sea floor and use momentum to get BIG jumps

he can't be controlled when leaping,

but when he is beached on land,

keep mouse or finger HELD DOWN

and killerpiller will inch forward

kill as many monster tribesman as you can,

don't run out of air

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON RESTARTS LEVEL

art: marilefabled
submission for the Minijam 108: Seaside
this is a prototype
